content.en: Bridge deck assessment: Researchers have developed innovative algorithms that use the dynamic response of passing vehicles to assess the condition of bridge decks and detect damage. These algorithms are based on various techniques such as dynamic response sensitivity analysis, laser measurements, dynamic displacement, and dynamic curvature. By analyzing the measurements taken from passing vehicles, these algorithms can provide valuable information about the health of bridges and help identify potential structural issues.
content.da: Vurdering af brodæk: Forskere har udviklet innovative algoritmer, der bruger den dynamiske respons fra passerende køretøjer til at vurdere tilstanden af brodæk og opdage skader. Disse algoritmer er baseret på forskellige teknikker såsom analyse af dynamisk responsfølsomhed, lasermålinger, dynamisk forskydning og dynamisk krumning. Ved at analysere målinger taget fra passerende køretøjer kan disse algoritmer give værdifuld information om broernes tilstand og hjælpe med at identificere potentielle strukturelle problemer.
